plot outline: Anand "Ram Karthik", an aspiring young Radio Jackie. One day, one boy called the radio center and told that I am a love failure and now I am going to do suicide. After listing his concern, Anand narrates a love story to keep him away from suicide. He told that story episode wise and his story becomes very popular. Incidentally, this story becomes true in Anand's life and bring his love "Pranali Ghoghare" closer to him. For finding out his love Anand faces many problems and struggles much. How he found out his love and struggles to make everyone happy, Forms rest of the Story.
title: Manchukurisevelalo
